headline: Assurant Honors California Veteran Josh Lopez with Mobility-Modified 2025 Chevrolet Suburban SUV
summary: ATLANTA, November 10, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, presented a specially-modified 2025 Chevrolet Suburban to Marine Sgt. Josh Lopez. The mobility-modified vehicle, presented in partnership with the Assurant Foundation and Wounded Warriors Family Support (WWFS), is part of the WWFS Mobility is Freedom program. The presentation took place la
